LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Building.label: Heavenly shaman beast insect
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Building.description: The Heavenly Shrine Beast Bug is a ground attack aircraft that belongs to the Arachne Bug Group fleet.It has long tentacles and powerful psychic floating ability, and can fly around the battlefield at high speed under the command of a towing species, attacking reckless enemy groups according to orders, or supporting the insect group's advance.\n\nIt cannot be effective unless it takes off!
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Entity.label: Heavenly shaman beast insect
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Entity.description: Huh? This is a ThingDef to manage the number of records.It should not be displayed under normal circumstances.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Leaving.label: Heavenly shaman beast insect (taking off)
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.label: hive mothership
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.comps.CompSendLetterAfterTi: A cry echoes from beyond the blue sky, and countless swarms of insects sweep over the colony.Among them, a particularly large shadow covers the sky. It is also a pillar of support. Right now, these terrifying beings are hovering above the colony. They will use any means necessary to destroy the defense lines and drop an endless sea of insects to devour the colonists. Until they leave their orbit, prepare for impact!
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.comps.CompFlyOverDropPods.c: The Hive Mothership is airdropping insect swarms! This unit will descend around the Hive Mothership and support it in ground combat.
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip.comps.CompShipArtillery.cus: Enemy battleships begin bombarding the colony! Secure cover immediately!
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Fake.label: hive mothership
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Fake.label: heavenly beast insect
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette.label: Heavenly Shrine Beast Bug (Disaster Gun)
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Missile.label: Heavenly Shrine Beast Bug (Disaster Missile)
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Bombardment.label: Heavenly shaman beast insect (acid bombardment)
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_Acid_Bombardment.label: large acid liquid group
LanguageData.ARA_HiveCorvette_Strike.label: Heavenly shaman beast insect (thorn stinging)
LanguageData.ARA_HiveShip_Fire_Incoming.label: Disaster Acid Bomb (Hive Mothership)
LanguageData.Proj_ARA_HiveCorvette.label: Heavenly Acid Group
LanguageData.Bullet_ARA_HiveCorvette.label: Heavenly Shrine Thorns
